aramettur was a settlement somewhere in Faer√ªn.
The town had a temple to Mystra, known as Mystras Mantle.
The sage Tabarast had been to Mystras Mantle in Haramettur sometime in the , where he learned that the One Who Walks, a Chosen of Mystra, was to be left alone and his identity left unacknowledged by the faithful of Mystra per her divine orders.
